content.html:
Hi there, I am Yash (y-uh-sh) ðŸ‘‹.

I am a computer programmer interested in network security, cryptography, and distributed systems.

I work as a Software Engineer at Cisco Systems in Bangalore.

I am interested in tech, economics, books, writing, history and philosophy.

As an introvert, I do not like to talk a lot in public spaces, but one to one is always an option. Contact me for anything and I will be more than happy to help.

Most preferred way to contact me is to email at yashagarwaljpr+blog [at] gmail [dot] com.

As an alternative, ping me on @yash__here.

My resume is here, but I am not looking for a new job right now.
